item.description:
Are you a fan of traditional Japanese Culture? Discover MODERN Japanese culture! Experience the vastly popular Anime (Japanese Animation) and Manga (Japanese comics) culture of Japan right here at the Boston Anime & Manga Convention.

Anime Boston is a 3-day convention held annually in Boston. While the main focus is Japanese Animation and Comics, they have expanded to include other aspects of modern Japanese pop culture such as Japanese Pop & Rock Music. Events include: Masquerade/ Art Show/ Karaoke/ Game Shows/ Video Games/ All day Japanese Animation Video programming.

A fun main highlight will be seeing the many participants who don costumes of their favorite Anime characters. The day is filled with possible panels to learn about every aspect of Anime & Manga that you can think of. There will be 6 Viewing Rooms showing a staggering amount of Anime Videos all day long.

Saturday Highlight: Japanese Taiko Drumming. Learn about and TRY Japanese drumming.

Come to discover MODERN Japanese Culture. See how vastly popular Anime & Manga are in the USA. Over 20,000 people are expected to attend over the 3 day affair. All ages welcome! The primary market for Manga (Japanese comics) is adults. This is a huge cultural phenomena.

For more information including admission costs see http://www.AnimeBoston.com/registration/registration_rates

Let's meet at 10:30 am See you there! Kim

For Questions contact me at http://www.Meetup.com/Japanese-Flower-Arranging/Events/120370522
item.name: Experience MODERN Japanese Culture at the Anime/Manga Convention in Boston!
